articles.title: Aditi Rao Hydari is the epitome of grace and royalty in regal jacket lehenga - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Aditi Rao Hydari turns showstopper as she walks the ramp for Ritu Kumar in a stunning lehenga.

articles.author: Sushmita Dey
articles.title: Kangana Ranaut REACTS As Court Found 'Sufficient Grounds' To Proceed Against Javed Akhtar For Criminal Intimid - Times Now
articles.description: Javed Akhtar has been summoned to appear before a Mumbai court on August 5 after Kanaga Ranaut's complaint. Additionally, he may face charges for acts intended to insult the modesty of a woman.
